column1: Currency format inconsistent across EUR, GBP and USD
column26:
Currency symbols are displayed in different positions depending on the selected currency, which breaks UI consistency and may confuse users.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open [https://demo.opencart.com|https://demo.opencart.com/]
# Change currency to EUR
# Observe price format
# Change currency to GBP
# Observe price format
# Change currency to USD
# Observe price format

*Actual Result:*

* EUR is displayed as {{104.85€}}
* GBP is displayed as {{£92.34}}
* USD is displayed as {{$122.00}}
* Currency symbol position is inconsistent

*Expected Result:*
All currencies should follow a consistent formatting pattern (e.g., symbol always before or always after the value).

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Minor
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment

column1: Quantity field accepts invalid values (0, large numbers, special characters
column26:
The quantity input field does not validate user input and allows invalid values, causing incorrect cart behavior and price calculation issues.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open any product page
# Enter {{0}} into the quantity field
# Click “Add to Cart”
# Observe cart behavior
# Repeat using a very large number (e.g., {{99999999999999}})
# Repeat using special characters (e.g., {{+}}, {{@}})

*Actual Result:*

* Invalid values are accepted
* Product is added to cart
* Total price is calculated incorrectly
* Special characters may remove the product from the cart

*Expected Result:*
Quantity field should validate input (min = 1, max = reasonable limit). Invalid values should trigger a validation error and prevent adding the product.

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Critical
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment

!KAN-17.png|width=250,alt="KAN-17.png"!

!KAN-17(2).png|width=250,alt="KAN-17(2).png"!

column1: Poor SEO configuration detected by Lighthouse
column26:
A Lighthouse audit reveals multiple SEO issues that negatively affect search engine visibility and indexability.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open [https://demo.opencart.com|https://demo.opencart.com/]
# Open Chrome DevTools → Lighthouse
# Run audit with default settings

*Actual Result:*

* SEO score: 36/100
* Page blocked from indexing (HTTP 403)
* robots.txt contains multiple errors
* Meta description missing

*Expected Result:*
Page should be indexable and follow basic SEO best practices (valid robots.txt, correct HTTP status, meta description present).

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Minor
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Lighthouse audit

!image-20260124-184348.png|width=671,alt="image-20260124-184348.png"!

column1: Out-of-stock products can be added to cart without warning
column26:
Products marked as out of stock can still be added to the cart without any warning on the product page.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open any product page
# Click “Add to Cart”
# Open Shopping Cart

*Actual Result:*
Product is added successfully. Only a generic warning appears in the cart.

*Expected Result:*
User should be warned on the product page. “Add to Cart” should be disabled or show a clear out‑of‑stock message.

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Critical
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment

column1: Test and irrelevant data displayed in product options on product page
column26:
Product option fields contain placeholder/test values that are not related to the actual product.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open product “Apple Cinema 30”
# Scroll to “Available Options”

*Actual Result:*
Options contain placeholder/test values (e.g., “test”, “Textarea”, fixed dates).

*Expected Result:*
Product options should contain only meaningful, product‑related values.

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Minor
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment

!image-20260126-111652.png|width=678,alt="image-20260126-111652.png"!

column1: Product count is incorrect in "Laptops & Notebooks" category
column26:
The category product count does not match the actual number of available products, which misleads users.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open “Laptops & Notebooks” category
# Note displayed product count in the left menu
# Observe the product list

*Actual Result:*

* Category shows “(5)”
* No products are displayed
* Subcategories show 0 products

*Expected Result:*
Displayed count should match the actual number of available products.

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Major
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment

!image-20260124-172857.png|width=526,alt="image-20260124-172857.png"!

column1: Subcategory product counts are inconsistent in "MP3 Players" category
column26:
The total category count does not match subcategory product counts, indicating incorrect product assignment or counting logic.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open “MP3 Players” category
# Observe category total count
# Observe subcategory counts

*Actual Result:*
Category shows “(4)”, but all subcategories show 0 products.

*Expected Result:*
Total count should match the sum of subcategory counts OR products should be assigned correctly.

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Major
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment

!image-20260124-171442.png|width=530,alt="image-20260124-171442.png"!

column1: Test subcategories are visible to users in "MP3 Players" category
column26:
Internal test subcategories are visible to users, which degrades UI quality and creates confusion.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open “MP3 Players” category
# Observe “Refine Search” section

*Actual Result:*
Subcategories like “test 11”, “test 12”, etc. are visible.

*Expected Result:*
Only meaningful, user‑friendly categories should be shown.

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Minor
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment

!image-20260124-171352.png|width=530,alt="image-20260124-171352.png"!

column1: Incorrect product count displayed for "Desktops" category
column26:
The displayed product count does not match the actual number of products available in subcategories.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open “Desktops” category
# Note displayed category count
# Observe subcategory counts

*Actual Result:*
Category shows “(13)”, but subcategories show only 1 product total.

*Expected Result:*
Displayed count should match the actual number of products.

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Major
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environmenty.

column1: Missing product filters (price, brand, memory, etc.) on category page
column26:
The category page lacks standard filtering options, limiting user ability to refine product listings.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open any category page
# Check available filters

*Actual Result:*
Only subcategory filters are available. No price, brand, or memory filters.

*Expected Result:*
Category page should include standard product filters (e.g., price, brand, memory).

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Minor
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment



!image-20260124-170101.png|width=526,alt="image-20260124-170101.png"!

column1: Category dropdown contains invalid test categories (test 1, test 2, etc.)
column26:
The category dropdown includes placeholder/test categories that should not be visible to users.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Perform a search
# Open category dropdown

*Actual Result:*
Dropdown contains “test 1”, “test 2”, etc.

*Expected Result:*
Only real, user‑friendly categories should be displayed.

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Minor
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment



!image-20260124-170321.png|width=259,alt="image-20260124-170321.png"!

column1: Category filter is not discoverable and confusing on search page
column26:
Users cannot filter by category from the homepage; the filter only appears after performing a search.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open homepage
# Try to locate category filter
# Perform a search
# Observe category dropdown

*Actual Result:*
Category filter is not available on homepage; only appears after search.

*Expected Result:*
Category filter should be accessible directly from homepage.

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Minor
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment

!image-20260125-123248.png|width=667,alt="image-20260125-123248.png"!

column1: Product is removed from cart when entering special characters into quantity field
column26:
Entering special characters into the quantity field causes the product to be removed from the cart instead of showing a validation error.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Add any product to cart
# Open Shopping Cart
# Enter special characters (e.g., {{+}}, {{@}}) into quantity field
# Click “Update”

*Actual Result:*
Product is removed from cart.

*Expected Result:*
System should prevent invalid input, display a validation error, and keep the product in the cart.

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Critical
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment

column1: Product image is missing for "Product 8" on catalog page
column26:
Product “Product 8” does not display an image on both catalog and product pages, resulting in a broken or empty image container.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Open “Desktops” category
# Scroll to page 2
# Locate “Product 8”
# Click on “Product 8”

*Actual Result:*
Product image is missing; placeholder or empty image area is shown.

*Expected Result:*
Product should display a valid image. Placeholder should only be used as fallback.

*Reproducibility:* Always
*Severity:* Minor
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment

!image-20260123-145903.png|width=678,alt="image-20260123-145903.png"!

column1: Users are blocked by Cloudflare Error 1015 (Rate Limited) when accessing account pages
column26:
Users are blocked by Cloudflare rate limiting while navigating normally through the site, preventing further usage.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Navigate through multiple pages
# Reload pages several times
# Observe Cloudflare error

*Actual Result:*
User is blocked with Error 1015. Access to the site is temporarily denied.

*Expected Result:*
User should not be rate‑limited during normal navigation.

*Reproducibility:* Sometimes
*Severity:* Blocker
*Environment:* Windows 10 / Chrome 122 / Demo environment
